title: Selfie for ONE
description: Good for 1 person. Unlimited self shoot. 1 backdrop of your choice. 6 digital copies. 1 printed copy (4R).

title: Selfie for TWO
description: Good for 2 persons. Unlimited self shoot. 1 backdrop of your choice. 7 digital copies. 2 printed copies (4R).

title: Squad Groupie
description: Good for 4 persons. Unlimited self shoot. 1 backdrop of your choice. 8 digital copies. 2 printed copies (4R).

title: Barkada Groupie
description: Good for 8 persons. Unlimited self shoot. 1 backdrop of your choice. 10 digital copies. 2 printed copies (4R).

title: Concept Studio
description: Good for 2 persons. Unlimited self shoot with 1 plain and 1 concept backdrop (Bohemian Dream, Chingu Pink). Free for babies 0–12 months.

title: Graduation PREMIUM
description: Toga only. Photoshoot with photographer. Graduation backdrop. 4 enhanced photos. Includes A4 photo, A4 frame, 5R photo, 4 wallet-sized photos.

title: Graduation ELITE
description: Toga and formal. 1 graduation + 1 plain backdrop. 8 enhanced photos. Includes A4 photo, frame, 5R, 4 wallet-sized toga and 4 formal photos.

title: Studio Rental
description: For 1–4 pax. Unlimited self shoot. Use of all plain backdrops and 1 concept. Includes all digital copies and free use of equipment.

title: Vogue Photoshoot
description: Good for 1 model. Shoot with senior photographer. Access to 4 plain and 3 concept backdrops. All enhanced digital copies. 2 printed copies (4R).

title: Kiddie Photoshoot
description: Celebrant + 2 parents & 1 sibling. 1 theme + 1 plain backdrop. 10 digital copies. Includes props, costume, 2 prints, raw files, and cake smash allowed.

title: Maternity Photoshoot
description: Includes all plain and concept backdrops. Family shoot included. All enhanced digital copies. Free maternity costumes, props, and printed copy.

title: Newborn Baby Photoshoot
description: For 1 newborn + 2 family members. 2 homey sets. All enhanced digital copies. Props and costumes included. Family shoot and print included.

title: Intimate Gender Reveal
description: Creative shoot with photographer. Includes props, static video, 1-minute edited video, enhanced digital copies, and a printed copy.

title: Birthday
description: 20 mins self shoot + 5 mins with photographer. 1 plain + 1 concept backdrop. 7 digital copies. 2 prints. Birthday sash, headband, and balloons included.

title: Family Photoshoot
description: Good for 5 members. Additional allowed. 1 chosen concept + all plain backdrops. All enhanced digital copies. Props and prints included.

title: Pre Nup Photoshoot
description: Good for 1 couple. Family members may join. 1 chosen concept + all plain backdrops. All enhanced digital copies. Printed copies included.

title: Student Groupie
description: Good for 10 students. 1 chosen backdrop. 10 digital copies. 4 printed (3 portrait + 1 band). Valid school ID required for all students.

title: Solo Graduation Package
description: Good for 1 pax. Unlimited self shoot on Graduation and 1 plain backdrop. Use of Toga/Barong. 7 digital copies. 2 printed copies included.

title: Barkada Graduation Package
description: Good for 4 pax. Unlimited self shoot on Graduation + 1 plain backdrop. Toga/Barong included. 7 digital copies. 4 printed copies included.
